main.name: Fardin Safikhani
main.description: I am a software developer and I use javascript/react to develop pages, as well as Unity and C# to create Games. This website will be a place to host my future projects and hopefully catch the eyes of employers
main.bio: I am a proud worker and I enjoy working on projects that have passion in them. During my time at school I learned a lot about data structures and the tools to make applications. I have always made sure to keep my skills topped off over the years by working on personal projects. Many of the projects I work on require knowledge of specific programming languages and in order to continue working on them I learned many coding languages, some of the skills I have and still do prided myself on are: Javascript, Python, C#, and Java. I have used these languages consistently throughout the years and Im sure that given enough time I can learn even more about them, including any new libraries that come with time.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to drop your email and get in touch ill get to you ASAP

education.description: Went to york and learned a lot about data structures and the actual makeup of the software we use day to day. York will always have a special place in my heart and I am happy i managed to learn as much as I could during my degree.

work.title: Crew Trainer
work.description: McDonalds has taught me a lot of skills including teamwork and general responsibility, from arriving to work early and prepping my station to having a strong grasp on all my duties so I can teach others who are still learning their work.
